security: Releasing personal information such as Emilio Rodriguez's date and place of birth, family details, employment history, financial status, and potential security vulnerabilities could harm his personal safety and compromise any sensitive work he is involved in for the agency. Disclosing his associations, language skills, and qualifications might also expose his operational capabilities to adversaries.
summary: This is a personal history statement for Emilio Americo Rodriguez, filled out on August 31, 1961, detailing his personal information, citizenship, education, language abilities, employment history, financial status, and military service.
summary_one_paragraph: Emilio Americo Rodriguez completed this personal history statement on August 31, 1961, providing extensive details about his life for potential employment as a contract agent. The document includes his birth information (born in Havana, Cuba, on January 27, 1928, and naturalized as a U.S. citizen), education (including studies at Tulane University), language skills (Spanish, Portuguese, French, and Italian), and employment history (including work for Century Electric Company and teaching positions). Rodriguez also discloses his financial status, marital status (married to Pauline Juanita Ross Rodriguez), information about his children, and details about his parents and military draft status.
title: Personal History Statement
